courses.name: Supplying request options
courses.description: The fetch() method can optionally accept a second parameter, an init object that allows you to control a number of different settings:

courses.name: Using the Fetch API
courses.description: The Fetch API provides a JavaScript interface for accessing and manipulating parts of the HTTP pipeline, such as requests and responses. It also provides a global fetch() method that provides an easy, logical way to fetch resources asynchronously across the network.
